actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill for the relief of the Precisa Calculating Machine Company, Incorporated.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named Utah corporation in full satisfaction of its claims against the United States arising out of the seizure of its property, and the ultimate destruction of its business, under jeopardy assessments made to collect income tax deficiencies which were later determined to be erroneous.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Precisa Calculating Machine Company, Incorporated.
